description: Try our easy to follow Speedy Beef Burgundy recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Speedy Beef Burgundy Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil and butter in a frying pan over medium heat. When melted and hot, add steaks and cook for 3 minutes each side or until golden. Transfer to a warm plate and cover loosely with foil.
Cook frozen mashed potato as per packet instructions. Keep warm.

Add mushroom and eschalot to pan. Cook for 8 minutes until mushroom is golden. Sprinkle over flour and stir. Cook for 1 minute. Slowly add wine and 1/2 cup water, stirring constantly, and bring to the boil. Whisk in mustard and tarragon. Season with salt and pepper.
Return steaks to pan and cook for 3 minutes for medium rare or until cooked to your liking. Serve steaks with sauce, green beans and mashed potato.
